ApiKeyAuth.description: API key used to authorize requests. Learn about how to create API keys at [Alma REST APIs](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/#defining)
ApiKeyAuth.name: apikey

apiDescription: For more information on how to use these APIs, including how to create an API key required for authentication, see [Alma REST APIs](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis).
